meanings.sent1: Wearing hats indoors is not permissible in this school.
meanings.sent2: It is permissible to bring your own snacks to the movie theater.
meanings.sent3: It was not permissible to jump in the puddles, but she couldn't resist.
meanings.sent4: His boss made an exception and allowed him to leave work early, which was permissible.
meanings.sent5: The teacher's smile made it clear that asking questions during class was permissible.

meanings.sent1: In this office, casual attire is permissible on Fridays.
meanings.sent2: It is permissible to use blue ink instead of black for signing documents.
meanings.sent3: The cat found it permissible to nap on the warm laundry straight from the dryer.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was the only permissible sound in the quiet library.
meanings.sent5: The chef's secret ingredient was permissible only to those who could guess it.

meanings.sent1: Smoking is not permissible in this restaurant.
meanings.sent2: It is permissible to park in this area for up to two hours.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous student found a way to make chewing gum permissible in class.
meanings.sent4: His creativity made the unconventional approach permissible in the traditional art gallery.
meanings.sent5: The team's victory dance was permissible only after the final whistle blew.
